docs.snippet: As Rodriguez brings his drug-laden baggage back to his team, a strange bit of fallout has occurred: Some people are feeling sorry for the Yankees....
docs.lead_paragraph: As Rodriguez brings his drug-laden baggage back to his team, a strange bit of fallout has occurred: Some people are feeling sorry for the Yankees.
docs.abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column holds that as Alex Rodriguez returns to New York Yankees with his drug-laden baggage after serving a season-long doping suspension, some people are actually feeling sorry for Yankees.

headline.main: With Alex Rodriguez Coming Back, Things Look Bleak in the Bronx
headline.print_headline: With Rodriguez Back, It’s Bleak in the Bronx

docs.snippet: Rodriguez, the Yankees third baseman, told federal agents in January that he had used performance-enhancing drugs supplied by Anthony Bosch’s South Florida clinic, according to a report in The Miami Herald....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rodriguez, the Yankees third baseman, told federal agents in January that he had used performance-enhancing drugs supplied by Anthony Bosch’s South Florida clinic, according to a report in The Miami Herald.
docs.abstract: Miami Herald reports that New York Yankees slugger Alex Rodriguez admitted to using performance-enhancing drugs after federal prosecutors granted him immunity in investigation of Anthony Bosch, owner of South Florida rejuvenation clinic Biogenesis of America.

headline.main: Alex Rodriguez Told Federal Agents of Doping in Bosch Case, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Rodriguez Told Federal Agents About Doping, Report Says

docs.abstract: Los Angeles Dodgers are poinsed to name Farhan Zaidi as team's general manger; Zaidi has worked in consulting, in business development for a division of a sports magazine, and in the Oakland Athletics’ front office for the last 10 years.

headline.main: Dodgers Set to Hire Farhan Zaidi, a Small-Market Executive, as G.M.
